firestore_id.description: The Firestore ID of the document.

type.description: The type of the space, defined by a limited set of categories.

space_id.description: A kebab-case unique identifier for the space, usually derived from the name.

description.description: A brief description of the space.

geometry.description: The geometry of the location in GeoJSON geometry format.

location.description: The address or general location of the space.

url.description: A URL or an array of URLs for more information about the space.

indoors.description: Indicates if the space is indoors.

accessible.description: Indicates if the space is wheelchair accessible.

restrooms.description: Indicates if the space has restrooms.

playground.description: Indicates if the space has a playground.

water_feature.description: Indicates if the space has a water feature.

drinking_fountain.description: Indicates if the space has a drinking fountain.

dog_park.description: Indicates if the space has a dog park.

seating.description: Indicates if the space has seating.

tables.description: Indicates if the space has tables.

wifi.description: Indicates if free wifi is available in this space.

lawn.description: Indicates if the space has lawns for recreation.

basketball.description: Indicates if the space has basketball courts.

tennis.description: Indicates if the space has tennis courts.

trees.description: Indicates if the space has trees.

art.description: Indicates if the space has art installations.

amenities.description: The amenities available at the space.

archived.description: Indicates if the space is archived and will not be included in the displayed data.

subtype.description: Additional categorization of the space, if applicable.

closed_for_construction.description: Indicates whether the space is closed for construction.

google_maps_id.description: Google Maps identifier for the location.
